 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִישׁ‎</span> **proper name, masculine** (probably \*<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַיְשְׁ‎</span> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קישׁא‎</span> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xi (1896), 167</sup> originally proper name, of deity as Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> which now only in proper name, of person [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Heid. 2. 67</sup>); — K(<span class="bdbLangGreek">ε</span>)<span class="bdbLangGreek">ις</span>: 

**1.** father of Saul [[1Sam.9.1|1Sam 9:1]]; [[1Sam.9.3|1Sam 9:3]] (twice in verse); [[1Sam.10.11|1Sam 10:11]]; [[1Sam.10.21|1Sam 10:21]]; [[1Sam.14.51|1Sam 14:51]]; [[2Sam.21.14|2Sam 21:14]]; [[1Chr.8.30|1Chr 8:30]]; [[1Chr.8.33|1Chr 8:33]] (where read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַבְנֵר‎</span> [[BDB#Be|Be]] [[BDB#Kau|Kau]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]]), v[[1Chr.8.33|1Chr 8:33]] = [[1Chr.9.36|1Chr 9:36]]; [[1Chr.9.39|1Chr 9:39]] (read as above), v[[1Chr.9.39|1Chr 9:39]]; [[1Chr.12.1|1Chr 12:1]]; [[1Chr.26.28|1Chr 26:28]]. 

**2.** Levites : 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** [[1Chr.23.21|1Chr 23:21]]; [[1Chr.23.22|1Chr 23:22]]; [[1Chr.24.29|1Chr 24:29]] (twice in verse). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** [[2Chr.29.12|2Chr 29:12]]. 

**3.** ancestor of Mordecai [[Esth.2.5|Esth 2:5]] (<span class="bdbLangGreek">Κεισαίου</span>).
